attributes.action: Stop consessions being given to people on benefits who want to do courses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I have recently been denied benefits, even though I am unable to work. As a result of this, I'm expected to fund a course for myself next year. If I was on benefits, I would be actually getting money and would have to pay less for this course.

How is this right?
